sourcesContent:
import React, { useState} from 'react'; import './AdminDashboard.css'; import myImg from './1337.png'; import img1 from './1.jpg' import img2 from './2.png' import img3 from './2.png' function AdminDashboard () { const [myIcon, setMyIcon] = useState('material-icons-sharp') const [asideStyle, setAsideStyle] = useState() const [theme, setTheme] = useState('lightmode') const [cls, setCls] = useState() const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false) // Displaying the aside const showAside = () => { setAsideStyle({display : 'block'}) } const hideAside = () => { setAsideStyle({display : 'none'}) } // Toggling between light and dark Themes const changeTheme = () => { if (theme === 'lightmode') { setCls('dark-theme-variables') setTheme('darkmode') console.log(theme) }else{ setCls('light-theme-variables') setTheme('lightmode') } } // Setting active components const handleClick = () => { setIsActive(!isActive); }; /* - Light mode is active by default on click dark mode : - change to dark mode - Dark mode icon became active - Light mode icon became not active on click light mode : - change to light mode - light mode icon became active - dark mode icon became not active */ return(
close
